articles.content:
Annual meeting of Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association held
    Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association took place in Copenhagen on Nov. 27.
 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the association, in a report called on the friends of Korea in different countries including Denmark to positively support the Korean people's cause of reunification and wage a more vigorous struggle to frustrate the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and provoke a war.    
 A solidarity message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
